oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-07-25 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 25, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performer Carl Belew (his first appearance on the Prince Albert show), and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, the Jordanaires, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1033rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Archie Campbell; June Webb; Carl Belew; Tommy Jackson; Jordanaires; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Hank Snow -- Chasin' A Rainbow (Hank Snow) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Hank Snow) -- Grant Turner introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Hank Snow, June Webb) -- Hank Snow and Grant Turner introduce Carl Belew -- No Regrets (Carl Belew) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Hank Snow) -- Grant Turner introduces Tommy Jackson -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Hank Snow and Grant Turner talk -- (The Angels Are Lighting) God's Little Candles (Hank Snow, Jordanaires) -- Hank Snow introduces Chet Atkins -- I'll See You In My Dreams (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
